g.text: 1. (A) Execute a transaction (TX0) and IBC VP (and VP)
- escrow/burn the specified amount of the denomination
- store the proof of the SendPacket (including FungibleTokenPacketData) to IBC storage
2. (Relayer) Scan events, make a RecvPacket, and request a TX (TX1) with the RecvPacket to B
3. (B) Execute the transaction (TX1) and IBC VP (and VP)
- unescrow/mint(?) the specified amount of the denomination
- store the receipt of the ReceivePacket
4. (Relayer) Scan events, make MsgAcknowledgement and request a TX (TX2) with the message to A
5. (A) Execute the transaction (TX2) and IBC VP (and VP)
Transfer (ICS20) (when requesting a TX to the source)
